text: Ni shuo:“Wo gaosu nimen zai an la nali suo shou de baochou you bi zhe geng elie de, hao ma? You deng ren ceng shou an la de qi jue he qian nu, ta shi tamen yibufen bian cheng houzi he zhu, yibufen chongbai ta wu te, zhe deng ren, tamen di diwei shi geng elie de, tamen geng yuan di beilile zhengdao.”
